Title: Chatbots
Text: Chatbots, conversational agents, or digital assistants, are all names for a virtual application that a user can interact with through natural conversation. They can be accessed via social media, web, or even by phone.

Title: Language Understanding
Text: Natural language understanding is a category of machine learning involved with parsing the intent and/or sentiment behind human speech and writing.

Title: Why Chatbots?
Text: With cloud-based technology, chatbot applications can scale to serve a large volume of customers. This means that users are able to access their needs and questions 24/7 without having to bog down human agents.

Title: Bot Framework
Text: Microsoft's Bot Framework is a set of tools and technologies that allows developers to build a single chatbot application to service multiple channels. Bot Framework supports social media such as Facebook and Twitter right out of the box, and also supports custom bot clients via a DirectLine API.

Title: Bot Framework - Customization
Text: Bot Framework only provides the essential skeleton for managing a conversation state and connecting to channels: the code and flow for the bot is developer-defined. This means you have total control of a bot's inner workings and features.
